The '''Iridescence Tour''' is an international music tour in [[Teyvat]]. It was begun in [[Fontaine]]. It is briefly mentioned in the [[Labyrinth Warriors]] event as a tour [[Xinyan]] was meant to be attending in [[Inazuma]] before its sudden cancellation<ref>{{Ref/Quest|A Tricky Situation}}</ref>.
